abstract: The really important question about the sale of Home Depot‘s construction supply business apparently isn’t the price, which Home Depot lowered 18 percent on Tuesday, to $8.5 billion, after round-the-clock negotiations.
lead_paragraph: The really important question about the sale of Home Depot‘s construction supply business apparently isn’t the price, which Home Depot lowered 18 percent on Tuesday, to $8.5 billion, after round-the-clock negotiations.

headline.main: Terms Aside, Did Home Depot Give Away the Store?
